author: BiancaPinolini
body:
**PR description**:

The necessary files to implement the timing reconstruction for Ecal-Phase2 through the weights method have been added.

[Here](https://indico.cern.ch/event/1222445/contributions/5142960/attachments/2548761/4389750/ECAL%20Phase%202_%20Time%20Local%20Reconstruction.pdf) you can find the link to the presentation of the MoCa meeting of the 16th November 2022.
title: Update to include the timing reco through weights
